title: Person Kneeling Facing Right

adjectives: Used to represent humility, attentiveness, or readiness.
verbs: Depicts the act of kneeling or lowering oneself to the ground.
nouns: A person shown in a kneeling position, facing to the right.

description: A person kneeling on one or both knees, facing right. Often represents prayer, respect, readiness, or a relaxed posture.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person kneeling facing right emoji shows a human figure resting on bent knees and facing right. The design features natural body proportions, soft gradients, and realistic shading. It can express calmness, attentiveness, or a respectful gesture, depending on the context.
